changes.description: The full One Buffalo Games website is now live! Explore our game hubs, original titles, and classic arcade games.
Enhanced responsive design for a seamless experience on all devices, from mobile to desktop.
Added a dedicated changelog page to track all future updates and improvements to the site.
The first version (MVP) of the One Buffalo Games website has been launched to the public.
Homepage now dynamically displays featured hubs, original games, and arcade classics from JSON data files.
Refactored key homepage sections into reusable React components for better maintainability.
The codrcg.com website has received a full redesign to align with our new branding and style.
Began development of the central One Buffalo Games portal project.
